specific_issues.description: S. 192, Older Americans Act Reauthorization Act - entire bill H.R. 211, the Reducing Environmental Barriers to Unified Infrastructure and Land Development (REBUILD) Act - entire bill S. 414, the California Desert Conservation and Recreation Act - entire bill S. 517, the Secure Rural Schools and Payment in Lieu of Taxes Act - entire bill H.R. 731, the Justice and Mental Health Collaboration Act - entire bill S. 933, the Comprehensive Justice and Mental Health Act - entire bill H.R. 988, the Elder Justice ActReauthorization Act - entire bill S. 1169, the Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention Reauthorization Act - entire bill H.R. 1211/S. 1588, the Mental Health in Schools Act - entire bill H.R. 1343/S. 688, the Establishing Beneficiary Equity in the Hospital Readmission Program Act - entire bill S. 1439/H.R. 3160, the Foster Youth Independence Act - entire bill S. 1513, the Second Chance Act Reauthorization Act - entire bill H.R. 1854/S. 993, the Comprehensive Justice and Mental Health Act - entire bill S. 1879, the Interior Improvement Act - entire bill S. 1893, the Mental Health Awareness and Improvement Act - entire bill S. 1945, the Mental Health Reform Act - entire bill H.R. 2197, the Youth PROMISE Act - entire bill H.R. 2646, the Helping Families in Mental Crisis Act - entire bill H.R. 2663, the Public Land Renewable Energy Development Act - entire bill FY 2017 Agriculture Appropriations - Agricultural Pests, APHIS funding, WIC FY 2017 Commerce, Justice, State Appropriations - funding for local law enforcement activities, including youth delinquency prevention, local law enforcement technology needs, domestic abuse programs, drug treatment, SCAAP, and the Southwest Border Prosecution Initiative. H.R. 3025, the Wildfire Airspace Protection Act - entire bill H.R. 3700, the Housing Opportunity Through Modernization Act - entire bill H.R. 4201, the Restoring the Partnership for County Health Care Costs Act - entire bill H.R. 4441, the Aviation Innovation, Reform, and Reauthorization Act - Airport Improvement Program; drone interference with wild fire fighting H.R. 4724, the Reducing Duplicative and Ineffective Federal Funding Act - entire bill FY 2017 Homeland Security Appropriations - local homeland security and disaster preparedness activities, including public safety, public health, emergency management personnel, communications infrastructure, Assistance to Firefighters Grant program, and Emergency Management Performance Grants FY 2017 Interior Appropriations - Section 6, Cooperative Endangered Species Conservation Fund, Payments in Lieu of Taxes FY 2017 Labor, Health and Human Services Appropriations - funding for CDC State & Local Capacity, Bioterrorism Hospital Program, MMRS, DMAT, MCH, Ryan White Title I, TB Control, family planning, substance abuse block grants, preventative health, nutrition services for older Americans, Federally Designated Health Professional Shortage Areas (HPSA), LSTA, Funding for Community Services and Social Services Block Grants FY 2017 Transportation, HUD Appropriations bill - CDBG, Section 8, HOME Investment Partnerships, homeless assistance, HOPWA, Elderly Housing, Airport Improvement Program funding. Base Closure and Realignment Commission (BRAC) EB-5 Visa Program reform Endangered Species Act/Habitat Conservation Intercept of Federal Tax Refunds for Delinquent Fines Older Americans Act reauthorization Salton Sea Restoration Project Temporary Assistance to Needy Families (TANF) Reauthorization Trans-Pacific Partnership - support for continued progress on negotiation and ratification by Congress 340B Hospital Drug program

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Army - Dept of (Corps of Engineers), Agriculture - Dept of (USDA), Bureau of Reclamation
